Key Match Events: The third quarter of the Nuggets-Thunder game became the Chet Holmgren and Shai Gilgeous-Alexander show. They scored Oklahomaâ€™s first 11 points and combined for 21 in the period.
The Thunder's defense limited the Nuggets to 17 points.
Post-Match Reflections: Denver coach Mike Malone raised the white flag with a little under two minutes as the visitors cruised to an impressive road win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Oklahoma's three turnovers early helped the Denver Nuggets to a fast start.
Nikola Jokic and Jamal Murray hummed early before the Thunder surged late in the first quarter to take a 31-24 lead.
The Nuggets did their job on offense but their defense couldn't step up.
Others: Chet Holmgren was a nuisance on the offensive glass.
Denver's bench struggled when reigning MVP Nikola Jokic wasn't on the court.
